Telegram._instructions: 1. Message @BotFather on Telegram 2. Send /newbot 3. Follow instructions 4. Copy token here 5. Get your chat ID from @userinfobot

Discord._instructions: 1. Go to https://discord.com/developers/applications 2. Create New Application 3. Go to Bot section 4. Create bot and copy token 5. Add bot to server

WhatsApp._instructions: 1. Go to https://developers.facebook.com 2. Create WhatsApp Business app 3. Get API key and phone number ID 4. Configure webhook
